classification: Books; Collages / Assemblages; Works on Paper
creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: old textbook ("You and Your Health") with paper and cardboard glued over pages and some pages torn out; cover is an old shipping bill of lading with vertical brown wavy lines painted over it; back cover has a line drawing in pen of a portrait of a man with a blue Afro hairstyle; various abstract imagery inside book
image_copyright: Copyrighted © Purvis Young. All rights reserved.
medium: Altered found book with pigments, graphite, ink, and collaged paper, cardboard, and printed materials
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
title: Untitled (You and Your Health)
